sentences.en: " And knock them little almond trees in the back.
sentences.cn: “ 把后院小杏仁树上的杏子打下来.

sentences.en: Almond is the main raw material for high - level cake.
sentences.cn: 杏仁是高级糕点的主要原料.

sentences.en: Coat the cake with remaining cream. Sides with almond flakes.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕周边涂上柠檬奶油,铺上杏仁片, 洒上少许可可粉,以奶油及葡萄装饰.

sentences.en: EBN + red date + gingko nuts + white fungus + almond.
sentences.cn: 燕窝+红枣+银杏果干+银耳+杏仁.

sentences.en: Further up the river, the vineyards start to thin out and the orange groves and almond trees take over.
sentences.cn: 继续溯流而上，葡萄园开始淡去，柑橘园和杏树多了起来。

sentences.en: Her dark almond eyes widened as she gazed at her present.
sentences.cn: 她注视着她得到的这个礼物,两只黑黑的杏眼睁得圆溜溜的.

sentences.en: In Castel Molo, high above Taormina, you can sample the famous almond wine made there.
sentences.cn: 在陶尔米纳山高处的莫罗堡，你可以品尝那里酿造的著名的杏仁酒。

sentences.en: Ingredient: Shea butter, sea salt and sweet almond oil etc.
sentences.cn: 主要成份: 乳木果、海盐、甜杏仁油 、 杏仁颗粒、溶角蛋白酶.

sentences.en: It is good for health to drink almond tea often.
sentences.cn: 常喝杏仁茶有益身体健康.

sentences.en: It was springtime and the slopes were ablaze with almond blossoms.
sentences.cn: 时当春季,怒放的扁桃花使那片山坡鲜红似火.

sentences.en: LSA refers to grinded mixture of watermelon seed, seed and almond.
sentences.cn: 西瓜籽,葵花籽, 杏仁混合后用搅拌机搅碎后,可以放入冰箱储藏随用随取.

sentences.en: Stir in the ground almonds and egg.
sentences.cn: 拌入碾碎的扁桃仁和鸡蛋。

sentences.en: Tensions and differences between Almond and O. P. Smith were no secret.
sentences.cn: 阿蒙德与O · P · 史密斯之间的分岐与紧张已经不再是秘密.

sentences.en: The almond is a small tree that has pink blossoms.
sentences.cn: 杏树是一种小树,开粉红色的花.

sentences.en: This almond - flavored cordial obtains its flavor from crushed apricot and peach pits.
sentences.cn: 这款杏味甜酒从杏仁和桃仁中获得味道,它叫什么名字?

sentences.en: This Almond Powder is suitable for making different kinds of cakes.
sentences.cn: 这种杏仁粉适合做各种各样的蛋糕.

words.tran_cn: [食品]杏仁，杏树；杏仁状的东西

phrases.tran_cn: [化]杏仁饼（油脂已榨尽的杏仁渣滓）

trans.tran_cn: 杏树，杏仁色，杏仁状的东西，扁桃仁
trans.tran_en: Almonds are pale oval nuts. They are often used in cooking.
